hexcessible.no_draw_methods: All methods of drawing are disabled. Please enable at least one to cast spells.
hexcessible.world_specific_autocomplete: This pattern is world-specific. Start casting with an Ancient Scroll in your offhand to learn it.
hexcessible.smartsig.bookkeeper.prefix: Based on your current stack, this will
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.title: Hexcessible Config
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.dimme: Dim the background of the spellcasting interface
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.prefe: Disable some moving animations in the spellcasting interface
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.hideF: Hide the patterns shown around the player when casting spells
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.showA: Show all dots in the spellcasting interface, instead of just the ones close to your cursor
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.keyDo: Press the N key while casting to open the book
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.upper: Represent a signature, e.g. qaq, as QAQ
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.noHex: Prevent Hexical from making you walk while the spellcasting interface is open.
[Hexical] Prevent Evoke & Telepathy while not idle
Prevent Hexical from casting Evoke & Telepathy while not idle in the spellcasting interface.
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.toolt: Render patterns in Hexcessible UIs, like Autocomplete or Idle Hover
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.short: Show shortcuts in the bottom left of the UI
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.toolt: Prevent tooltips from moving around, instead always positioning them top-left.
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.keybo: When keyboard drawing, show markers for the keys you can press to advance drawing
Preview where you're trying to place it (even if it can't place there)
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.autoC: Number of options to show on one page
__note: unsure why, but ComplexHex doesn't seem to set this.
